handleUpdate

public void handleUpdate(boolean isBaseEventType,
                         RevisionStateMerge revisionState,
                         RevisionEventBeanMerge revisionEvent,

Description copied from interface: UpdateStrategy
Merge properties.

Parameters:
isBaseEventType - true if the event is a base event type
revisionState - the current state, to be updated.
revisionEvent - the new event to merge
typesDesc - descriptor for event type of the new event to merge
